title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for f'(1) - f'(-1) = 0

1 point is earned for the explanation, using Mean Value Theorem

descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for f'(1) - f'(-1) = 0

1 point is earned for the explanation, using Mean Value Theorem

f' is differentiable ⇒ f' is continuous on the interval −1≤x≤1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacqGHsislcaaIXaGaeyizImQaamiEaiabgsMiJkaaigdaaaa@3CE0@

f ′ (1)− f ′ (−1) 1−(−1) = 0−0 2 =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGabmOza8aagaqba8qacaGGOaGaaGymaiaacMca cqGHsislceWGMbWdayaafaWdbiaacIcacqGHsislcaaIXaGaaiykaa WdaeaapeGaaGymaiabgkHiTiaacIcacqGHsislcaaIXaGaaiykaaaa cqGH9aqpdaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGimaiabgkHiTiaaicdaa8aabaWdbi aaikdaaaGaeyypa0JaaGimaaaa@496C@

Therefore, by the Mean Value Theorem, there is at least one value c, -1 < c < 1 , such that f''(c)=0.
